Form Section Header is h2.form-header

Form Header is h5.form-header

Both headers have optional usage. Don't use .form-header with other heading sizes!!!

Proper usage of form elements styling requires to follow markup: .form-row > .exp-form-group > input.form-control + label.

Placeholders should have space as a value. Inputs should have IDs matching the labels.

* Input type number are forced to render without spin buttons.
